parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description: The maximum number of records to retrieve at once.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: Marks the current position to start reading from.

parameters.name: ScriptId
parameters.description: The script ID. Only common scripts are supported.

parameters.name: ScriptName
parameters.description: The name of the script. Only common scripts are supported. Fuzzy search is supported.

parameters.name: ScriptType
parameters.description:
Type of cluster script. Possible values:

- BOOTSTRAP: Bootstrap script.
- NORMAL: Regular cluster script.
